_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: p2p Screensharing
author: admin@williamharrison.xyz
description: Chat and screenshare peer-to-peer, without a server, no account needed.

installation.script:
#!/bin/bash

apt update
apt install -y git

# Update npm
npm install npm@latest -g

mkdir -p /mnt/server
cd /mnt/server

# Remove existing files, if any
rm -rf ./**

# Clone repository
git clone https://github.com/WilliamDavidHarrison/p2p-screensharing.git
cd p2p-screensharing

# Move files
mv ** ../
cd ..
rm -rf p2p-screensharing/

# Install dependencies
npm install

exit 0
